Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Our hotel's catering teams offer excellent customizable menus for Jeddah's business meetings.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Jeddah business hotel with full-service business center, concierge levels and lounge.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Comprehensive meeting facilities featuring wireless Internet access throughout entire hotel.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Newly refurbished meeting rooms that offers state-of-the-art event space & on-site business services

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Flexible meeting space with latest audio-visual technology.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Multilingual simultaneous translation, integrated video conferencing offered by expert events team

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Most spacious hotel rooms in Jeddah with well lit & large desk area and high-speed internet access.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: New Marriott bedding with most comfortable mattress toppers, cotton-rich linens and 6 pillows.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Connecting rooms available with views of Jeddah's cityscape or pool perfect for families.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: 54 well-appointed suites that offers luxurious amenities ideal for business travelers.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Our hotel offers smoking and no-smoking rooms, some with free newspaper delivery.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Flat TV's, safe, bathrobes, slippers, iron & ironing board, hairdryers and luxurious toiletries.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Most spacious hotel rooms in Jeddah with well lit & large desk area and high-speed internet access.
New Marriott bedding with most comfortable mattress toppers, cotton-rich linens and 6 pillows.
Connecting rooms available with views of Jeddah's cityscape or pool perfect for families.
54 well-appointed suites that offers luxurious amenities ideal for business travelers.
Our hotel offers smoking and no-smoking rooms, some with free newspaper delivery.
Flat TV's, safe, bathrobes, slippers, iron & ironing board, hairdryers and luxurious toiletries.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Creative catering capabilities to enhance weddings, social events and theme parties.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Certified event and wedding planners to personalize & coordinate every detail from start to finish.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: 1259 sq.ft Aroos El Bahar Ballroom can beautifully host events for up to 200 guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Extensive amenities and ideal accommodations for out-of-town guests visiting for weddings in Jeddah.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: The meeting room next to the business center perfectly designed for small meetings and conferences.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Lotus Auditorium can accoomodate 180 invitees theatre style for conference, training and workshops.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Tahliah Shopping Center, 15 minutes away from our hotel offering the most luxurious malls in Jeddah.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Fakieh Aquarium is the first of its kind in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Jeddah's City Center hosts commercial markets, proeminent local malls and traditional arhitecture.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 4
Description.Text: Khouzam Palace located in Jeddah is considered one of the most important museum in Saudi Arabia.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 5
Description.Text: Jeddah Corniche extends for more than a 100 km and engulfs more than 14 artificial lakes.

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 6
Description.Text: Makkah Gate: it is a historic place as well as business centre that is busy round the clock.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Jeddah Marriott Hotel is located in the heart of Jeddah and has the most spacious rooms and luxurious lobby. Amenities include outdoor swimming pool, health club, wireless Internet and city or pool view rooms with air conditioning.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: The Jeddah Marriott Hotel is situated in the heart of Jeddah’s business district and is only 25 minutes from King Abdul-Aziz International Airport. The hotel is about 10 minutes from Jeddah’s beautiful Corniche and provides easy access to downtown and popular shopping malls. All our spacious hotel rooms in Jeddah are perfectly suited for both, business and leisure travellers featuring WiFi high-speed Internet, luxurious bedding and extensive amenities. An outdoor swimming pool, health club, and ultra modern fitness facilities offers an array of recreational activities. Two restaurants with international cuisine and room service available 24 hours. Our hotel features extensive events and meetings facilities, here you'll find the perfect venue for meetings and social events with a reputable catering service team. Jeddah has a magical blend of the majesty of the past and today's glamour, the first stop for pilgrims to Makkah and encompasses many years of history.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: The Jeddah Marriott hotel is centrally located in the heart of Jeddah's business district 10 minutes away from Corniche Walk, Jeddah Fountain, old town and traditional souks (markets). Close to Embassies and Consulates.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Jeddah business hotel located near major Jeddah's business facilities, events and exibition center.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: The largest hotel rooms in Jeddah's business district with extensive recreational activities.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: A health club with a 300 sqm2 fitness center with the latest equipment, cardio machines facing swimming pool in a daylight room.

Description.Name: Hotel Alert
Description.Text: The hotel swimming pool is currently closed for renovation

Additional Parking Information
Description.Text: Security staff are on duty 24 hours a day.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located at Mezanine level featuring city views Al Bassateen restaurant is serving breakfast, lunch and dinner buffets daily. Themes nights, special promotions, and a la carte menu is available. Complimentary daily WiFi access it is available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Exceptional cafe situated at hotel lobby level, serving a collection of light snacks and refreshments throughout the day. Daily complimnetary cofee from 7:00 am to 9:00 am as well as daily complimentary WiFi connection available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Located in Al Hamra district - Vertigo is a nice Cafe and Grille /restaurant with a 60′s/70′s theme, it’s the kind of place where you can relax, hang out with friends and just enjoy your time.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Ensuring a remarkable level of uniqueness, Byblos serves two special dishes daily, available seven days a week for lunch and dinner meals. If you are a fan of Lebanese food you will love it.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Toki is a member of the Leylaty Group of restaurants, with an an interior anything but understated and outstanding chienese cuisine.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The menu contains a mix of food including a variety of pasta, pizzas, sandwiches and seafood. International Fusion would be a good way to describe it all. There are some exotic choices on the drinks list, a great selection of hot and cold coffees.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: It is designed like an inside garden with waterfall, a glass roof, and is delightfully light and bright inside.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: The Manhattan Fish Market in Jeddah is the first ever in the Arab Region . There is a choice of soups, salad’s, warm appetizers, Manhattan favorites, grilled dishes, platters and “flamed” dishes available.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Best known for grilled steaks, chicken and seafood, Outback also offers a wide variety of crisp salads and freshly made soups and sides.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Piatto offers the best of “Fresh Italian Dining” in a relaxing atmosphere with a delightful Italian menu to share with friends and family.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Uptown966, an upscale restaurant for casual dining and is a suitable place for family gatherings as well as business meetings.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: friendly and family setting atmosphere with something exciting on the menu for all age groups with great emphasis on freshness and quality.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take An Nuzhah/Route 320 to Prince Majid Rd/Route 70 for approximate time of 7 min (7.2 km).Head west for 500 m, at the roundabout, take the 2nd exit for 2.4 km. Take the ramp to An Nuzhah/Route 320 for 550 m. and keep left at the fork to continue toward An Nuzhah/Route 320 for 1.4 km then slight right onto An Nuzhah/Route 320 and keep 2.5 km.At this point turn right onto Prince Majid Rd/Route 70 and continue on Bani Malik your drive to Jeddah Marriott for 21 km. Now after Haramain Center turn right onto Bani Malik for 1.5 km. At this point turn right and continue for 650 m, and now Jeddah Marriott Hotel will be on your left side.

Message Text
Description.Text: Every Friday Jeddah Marriott Hotel presents the ideal venue for the ultimate Jeddah's brunch with an exciting mix of live cooking stations and food from around the world. Doors open at 12.30 pm until 4:00 pm at Al Bassaten Restaurant located at Mezanine level.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Hotel Special Offer - Business Travel Plus!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Jeddah Marriott offers selective Jeddah hotel deals and packages designed to suit your business travel extra essentials. Wide open work spaces, central location and quiet energy are now available to make your trip a truly comfortable and rewarding experience. Let your productivity roam free!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Marriott International’s new Arabic-language website www.arabic.marriott.com allows travelers to browse and book rooms, confirm their stays and change reservations among Marriott International’s hotel portfolio of nearly 3,700 properties around the world.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: This historical centre in Jeddah is steeped in beautiful architecture & a mix of modern & classic culture. Al-Balad attracts many tourists every year, eager to experience the sight of old-world architecture dating from the 7th. century. Visit Al-Balad while staying at the Jeddah Marriott Hotel.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Make life more enjoyable with WIFI High Speed Internet access at the Marriott where all our rooms feature wireless internet access and seamless connections throughout the hotel. Roam and enjoy High Speed while relaxing at the pool or enjoying a cappuccino in the Lobby.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Make life more enjoyable with WIFI High Speed Internet access at the Marriott where all our rooms feature wireless internet access and seamless connections throughout the hotel. Roam and enjoy High Speed while relaxing at the pool or enjoying a cappuccino in the Lobby.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Our centrally located hotel in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia is near businesses, exhibition centers, consulates and shopping malls. The Old Town can be found nearby as well as the markets and museums in Jeddah's city center.

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Fully equipped rooms and suites offer Marriott comfortable bedding. All rooms feature high-speed internet access, satellite TV’s, marble bathrooms, alarm clock, in-room safe, mini bar, and two phone lines. Suites showcase large living rooms.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Extensive Health Club facilities with outdoor swimming pool and a fitness center featuring new equipment as well as steam room, sauna, whirlpool. Guests can grab a bite at "The Atrium" or to try local flavor at Al Bassateen all day dining restaurant.

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: Ensure successful meetings, conferences, social events in our 13,627 sq. ft. of flexible event space, one ballroom with 6,512 sq. ft. dividable in 3 sections and wireless high speed internet access in all the meeting. rooms.

Description.Name: Value proposition 5
Description.Text: The city of Makkah is about 70 kilometers from the property. Jeddah Airport is 15 kilometers away from the Marriott Jeddah Hotel and can be reached in approximately 20 minutes if traveling by car.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: Jeddah Marriott 5 star business-friendly hotel is located in Jeddah’s city center, only 25 minutes from Jeddah International Airport. We are focusing on business groups, oil and healthcare companies with events needs within the local area. Outside catering segment it's one of our strength within the local market. Leisure segment is medium during weekends and holidays. Large pool, fully equipped fitness center, two restaurants and extensive health club facilities offer an array of recreational and leisure activities. There’s dedicated space for exclusive meeting and banqueting space, including a 6512 sqf ballroom perfectly suited for large meetings, receptions and weddings. Two traditional al day dining restaurants (the largest 125 pax) featuring exquisite venues with refreshing local and international cuisine. Local attractions include King Fahd's Fountain and Nasseef House offering a variety of outdoor activities in Jeddah.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: With 11 meeting rooms 13,627 sq ft of total meeting space Jeddah Marriott is one of the most important event’s hotel in Jeddah KSA. The Largest meeting room is Aroos Al Bahr Ballroom with maximum meeting space of 6,512 sq ft and maximum capacity of 300. Maximum of 5 breakout meeting room(s) Exhibition space on-site with 4,445 sqf, Lotus Auditorium can host conferences and events for up to 180 guests. You can host as well an event in our 5 flexible meeting rooms with latest audio-visual technology some with daylight. On-site full-service business center is available offering concierge services, fax and secretarial service. Discover state-of-the-art technology & AV-Technicians throughout your event and conference and take advantage of free wireless Internet access in all meeting rooms.
